titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to change certain requirements relating to a sponsor's affidavit of support for an alien.
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to change certain requirements relating to a sponsor's affidavit of support for an alien.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

bill.summary: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase certain income-related requirements with respect to a sponsor's affidavit of support for an alien.
